meanings.definition: A tropical plant with bright red flowers.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with beautiful ixoras.
meanings.sent2: Ixoras are commonly found in tropical regions.
meanings.sent3: The ixoras in the garden seemed to be gossiping with the other flowers.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as vibrant as a cluster of ixoras in full bloom.
meanings.sent5: The scent of ixoras lingered in the air, sweet and inviting.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'ixora'.
meanings.sent1: She had a collection of different colored ixoras.
meanings.sent2: The book listed various ixoras from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The ixoras at the market were having a party to celebrate their plural form.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with the chatter of ixoras, each with its own unique story.
meanings.sent5: In her garden, ixoras danced together in a colorful display of unity.
